remarks: Corollary of the division algorithm.  If an integer ` D ` greater than ` 1 ` divides ` N ` , then it does not divide any of ` N + 1 ` , ` N + 2 ` ... ` N + ( D - 1 ) ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)
statement: ndvdsadd $p |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ D e. NN /\ ( K e. NN /\ K < D ) ) -> ( D || N -> -. D || ( N + K ) ) ) $.
